title: New: Ancient Mariner – Acedia
body:
The latest single from pseudo-ambient solo guitarist **Ancient Mariner** treads the thematic vein of layered and looping hooks that he is becoming known for.

Thia multifaceted track pours on the guitars and synth while blending them into a proverbial smörgåsbord of a sound-scape via the use of his renowned pedal board; the envy of many a music forum dweller.
